result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathan J. Stone was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: revoked

9:29 a.m. Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in custody in court with attorney Jeffrey Jazgar.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties in receipt of revocation packet. Schiek/Jazgar/Court statement on sentencing. 
Court Sentence
Jail - 4 months with Huber for all purposes
Jail credit - 50 days
Any unpaid court obligations are reduced to civil judgment.
Appeal rights given. 
Adj. 9:42 a.m.
Notified Attorney Jazgar's office that no enclosures were included with letter filed 3-2-16 for this case
- includes cover letter and revocation summary
PC from Ms. Sivertsen at PD - new attorney being appointed - paperwork is coming.

9:33 a.m. Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court with attorney Brian F. Bennett.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek states agreement has been reached. Bennett enters no contest plea.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Victim impact statement filed. Schiek/Bennett/Court statement to sentencing.
Court Sentence
WHS/POP - 12 months
CC/DNA Surcharge/Supervision Fees
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO
Appeal Rights given
Adj. 9:46 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 09-10-2015 09:30 am

11:05 a.m. - Attorney Brian F. Bennett in court, appearing telephonically with leave of the court.  Defendant does not appear.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case is on calendar for jury trial.  Bennett states advised defendant of need to appear today - has not heard from him since last court appearance.  Schiek does not request warrant.  Ready to proceed to trial.  Bail continued.  Adjourned 11:08 a.m.
11:09 a.m. - Back on record - Defendant, Jonathan J. Stone now appears.  Defendant advised to contact attorney Brian Bennett regarding settlement of case today also advised of jury trial date currently set.

03:59 pm - Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court with attorney Brian F. Bennett.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bennett states in receipt of offer which was rejected by defendant - jury trial requested.  Bail continued.  Jury trial scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 28, 2015 at 11:00 am.
States Reply to Discovery and State's Demand for Discovery

02:31 pm - Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court with attorney Brian F. Bennett.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea 
Bail continued  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

03:16 pm - Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions defendant as to status of PD appointment - found eligible but unable to obtain counsel as of last Monday.  Defendant states contacted PD this morning - has not heard back from them.  Court adjourns.  Bail continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 13, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance at 03-16-2015 02:30 pm

Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
3:06
Court statement - received word that Defendant is eligible for PD but unable to appoint counsel yet- Court will adj
Bail continued  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jonathan J. Stone
Current: 139 Maple Street, Rhinelander, WI 54501 United States  (Effective: 02-18-2015)
Prior: 120 King Street, Apt. B, Rhinelander, WI 54501
Notified Brandi - Made VA -They did not have warrant yet and confirmed with DA's office that it hasnt and wont be sent down

01:30 pm - Defendant Jonathan J. Stone in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failed to appear on February 9, 2015 - Defendant states forgot about the court date - forgot to write it down.  Court quashes warrant.    In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - defendant will contact PD,  Michlig statement to bail - Court sets $ sig bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Jonathan J. Stone not in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
2:07
No appearance - Michlig statement to PC from defendant - Request warrant - Court authorizes warrant -
02:09 pm - Defendant Jonathan J. Stone not in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No proof of service.
